long_description: Equip yourself for exploration in the travel -riendly prAna Terrain Shirt. The lightweight polyester and organic cotton blend is wrinkle-resistant and UPF-rated for sun protection. Double front pockets feature no-fuss rip-and-stick closures; sleeves roll up and are held in place with tabs.
